oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: The New Digital Bleek and Lloyd
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: |a!kunta (Stoffel) (I)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Words and sentences given by |a!kunta. 1) This story contains many notes on the verso pages concerning names of |xam, their genealogies, the names of places where they come from and the names of different groups of |xam (see pp.114v, 221v and 270v), 2) This story is found in Book I and Book II.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Wilhelm Bleek notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Words and sentences (given by |a!kunta)
